Talon:


Talosn started to type in a computer that had conections in all th=
e base, she was checking all the terminals and she suddely said by com link=
"Lord Perseus, some one has been here before... A Predacon... He downloaded=
 a pod's information to the BlackFortress... Acording to records it was a t=
ime a go among Jiaxus's attack and today... what this could mean?"


From: =
Kraftlos 
Sent: Saturday, February 13, 2010 7:30 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.=
com 
Subject: Re: The Old Maximal Base/Unicron's come back


  

OOC: Talon=
, Ravenchief and Lord Perseus were supposed to be outside the power room wh=
ere radio doesn't reach.  But I guess a radio booster could be active.

BIC=
:

The problem was simple.  The reactor had simply been shut down.

"The Ma=
ximals must have been totally unprepared for Jhaxius' attack.  They shut do=
wn the power and closed the blast doors as a last ditch effort to prevent t=
he enemy from using the base," said Perseus.  "What they failed to realize =
is that he didn't want this base, he wanted to kill the maximals inside."

=
Ravenchief opened the glass cover and pressed the giant red button on the r=
eactor controls, but nothing happened.

"That's the emergency shut off,  pu=
ll up on the switch."

Ravenchief pulled and there was a sudden wirring sou=
nd as lights and equipement turned on all over the base.  They were suddenl=
y startled by a loud voice:

"SENTINEL ONLINE: EXTERIOR WEAPONS SYSTEM AND =
SHIELDS, ENTRY DOORS, INTERNAL CANNONS, NON-OPERATIONAL.  ENEMY SIGNATURES =
DETECTED."

Meanwhile...

Salveo keyed the radio in the shuttle.

"Legacy, =
this is Pacificus Maximal Leutienant Salveo.  We have encountered minion ac=
tivity within this base, perhaps a trap set for our eventual return."

He s=
uddenly noticed the scanners picking up power activity within the base.

"L=
ord Perseus, is the base secure?"

"We have not encountered any resistence =
in the lower base.  Start offloading, our gear into the large room by the c=
ommand center, all personel to the entrance area."



  On Feb 13, 2010 1:2=
6 PM, "Super Cyclonus" <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

  >Talon:
  >
  >"=
Report at my location and we can start to secire the
  >area" said talon

 =
 "Understood." Legacy intoned from his aerial position, his voice cold and =
unfeeling over the transmission lines.

  Above the old Maximal base the mi=
litary satellite that was Legacy shifted and contorted as it changed forms,=
 the sound of gears moving together could be heard as it quickly assumed it=
s armored robotic mode. Boosters flare for a moment allowing Legacy to touc=
h down and look around, his single optic shifted colors then resuming its t=
ypical crimson glow.

  Turning his rather bulky form Legacy quickly made h=
is way to Talon's position, "I see no evidence of an attack in progress, al=
though there are residual energy patterns here." Legacy turned his cold gaz=
e on talon, "Where are the minions?"

  (OOC: I am not sure where the other=
 Maximals are, or where Talon is in relation to all of this, so I was somew=
hat vague. This should open to anyone that is in the area I would guess??)
=

  Preston
  (Legacy)





  ------------------------------------

  Yahoo!=
